mapper.select:
SELECT CI.id, CI.fileId, CI.fileUrl, CI.lastUpdateDate, CI.lastUpdateOperatorId, CI.linkUrl, CI.name, CI.typeCode, CI.levelCode, CI.orderIndex, CI.title, CI.valid, CI.createDate, CI.createOperatorId, CI.remark, CI.content, CI.categoryCode, CI.keywords FROM CI_CONTENT_INFO CI WHERE
AND CI.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CI_CONTENT_INFO ( id, fileId, fileUrl, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateOperatorId, linkUrl, name, typeCode, levelCode, orderIndex, title, valid, createDate, createOperatorId, remark, content, categoryCode, keywords ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{fileId}, #{fileUrl}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateOperatorId}, #{linkUrl}, #{name}, #{type.code}, #{level.code}, #{orderIndex}, #{title}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{createOperatorId}, #{remark}, #{content}, #{category.code}, #{keywords} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM CI_CONTENT_INFO WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CI_CONTENT_INFO
fileId = #{fileId,javaType=java.lang.String},
fileUrl = #{fileUrl,javaType=java.lang.String},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateOperatorId = #{lastUpdateOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
linkUrl = #{linkUrl,javaType=java.lang.String},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
typeCode = #{type.code,javaType=java.lang.String},
levelCode = #{level.code,javaType=java.lang.String},
orderIndex = #{orderIndex,javaType=int},
title = #{title,javaType=java.lang.String},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
content = #{content,javaType=java.lang.String},
categoryCode = #{category.code,javaType=java.lang.String},
keywords = #{keywords,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
